mapper.select: select news._id, sender, receiver, carrier_id, type, create_time, content, state, u._id, name, avatar_order, avatar.link from news LEFT JOIN users u on news.sender = u._id LEFT JOIN avatar on avatar_order = avatar.`order` where carrier_id = #{id};
select COUNT(_id) from news where carrier_id = #{articleId} and type = #{type};
select carrier_id from news where sender = #{id};
